___location.description: Api Management service data center location.

___name.description: The name of the Api Management service.

___tags.description: Api Management service tags. A maximum of 10 tags can be provided for a resource, and each tag must have a key no greater than 128 characters (and value no greater than 256 characters)

$eref.description: Properties of an Api Management service resource description.

___vpnconfiguration.description: Virtual network configuration of the Api Management service.

___runtimeUrl.description: Proxy endpoint Url of the Api Management service.

___portalUrl.description: management portal endpoint Url of the Api Management service.

___vpnType.description: Virtual private network type of the Api Management service.

___staticIPs.description: Static ip addresses of the Api Management service virtual machines. Available only for Standard and Premium Sku.

___createdAtUtc.description: Creation UTC date of the Api Management service.The date conforms to the following format: `yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ssZ` as specified by the ISO 8601 standard.

___additionalLocations.description: Additional datacenter locations description of the Api Management service.

___targetProvisioningState.description: Target provisioning state of the Api Management service.The state that is targeted for the Api Management service by the infrastructure.

___scmUrl.description: Scm endpoint Url of the Api Management service.

___managementApiUrl.description: management api endpoint Url of the Api Management service.

___provisioningState.description: Provisioning state of the Api Management service.

___customProperties.description: Custom properties of the Api Management service.

___hostnameConfigurations.description: Custom hostname configuration of the Api Management service.

___properties.description: Properties of the Api Management service.

___capacity.description: Capacity of the Sku (number of deployed units of the Sku).
